ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Spell Quests...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... as far as i can tell, pet always tries to stand at your loc plus a bit on each axis (or mebbe it was minus...been a while since i messed with it) so it
ygData.messageBody:
>5> Why does my pet always stand on what I'm trying to loot?
as far as i can tell, pet always tries to stand at your loc plus a bit on
each axis (or mebbe it was minus...been a while since i messed with it) so
it will always stand in the same direction relative to you...
try walking to the other side of the corpse, and it should get out of your
way...
also worth watching when resting near walls and such, since pets sometimes
go wandering if they cant stand where they want to...

>6> Is being agnostic going to cause grief later?
depends on how much verant decides to do with the religion specific items...
unless they do a lot of them, odds are pretty good that whichever religion
you pick is gonna be wrong too tho, so probably not worth worrying about...
(i picked Brell before the benefits of agnostic were discovered, and it
hasn't seemed to be too big a problem so far)

>7> Any other tips you might have would be greatly appreciated.
biggest piece of advice i would give, is figure out Mez, and learn to time
it....

X.
